nodes.text: The Kuat Drive Yards Class-C frigate was a military escort.

The Class-C was 330 meters long, and carried 20 officers and 200 crew. Its command center was located in the middle superstructure, while the hospital wings and engine section were in the sternward upper and lower sections, respectively.

The frigate was produced by Kuat Drive Yards in the Galactic Republic's latter days. A few months after the end of the Clone Wars they produced the first starships in the EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate line, a successor design to the Class-C.
The New Republic-defended Carosite medical frigate Sudden Restoration was a modified representative of this class.

As the only known representative of this class is the Sudden Restoration, a vessel which had been modified to serve as a hospital ship, the original role and characteristics of the frigate are unknown.
